resources.string: There is a mandatory update to this application, would you like to download it now?
There is an update to this application, would you like to download it now?
Here you can find applications recommended by LG, These are specially selected for you. They are useful, worthwhile or fun to use.
If the update was not successful you can retry the installation by clicking below.
The download has failed due to a connection problem, would you like to retry the download now?
Connection problem detected, please check your internet connection and restart the application.
Please wait while update is downloaded…
Version 1.0.1 FOR TEST PURPOSES ONLY - NOT FOR PRODUCTION USE!

Welcome to App Advisor. This Application allows you to view lists of android applications which are recommended to you by LG. LG regularly updates these recommendations to give you the best applications that are available on the Google Market, these are specially selected for you. They are useful, worthwhile and fun to use. You can also browse old lists of recommended applications as well as for different countries.
Do not show this message again

All applications featured within App Advisor adhere to the Google Market Terms of Service. The downloading of an application could be limited depending on the condition of Android Market (Country, Developer, and etc.)
View a current list of up-to-date applications recommended by LG.
Browse different recommendations for different countries.
View a History of recommendations from earlier points in time.
Download & install applications via Google Market directly from App Advisor.

Searching the Google Market for good quality applications can sometimes be tedious. App Advisor makes it easy to install the best applications with minimal effort. LG keep their recommended applications up-to-date, based on popularity and rating. You can also access previous recommendations using the history function off the application. LG also allow access to application recommendations for different countries, so be sure to checkout the “Browse” feature off App Advisor found in the menu. You can also download applications to your phone via Google market directly from App Advisor with no need to search. We hope you enjoy App Advisor.
Connection problem detected, please check your internet connection and retry.
